markdownRemark.html:
In 2019, I was involved in 2 projects to create chatbots using the collaborative platform SAP Conversational AI. Unfortunately, the work was taken to the shed and never seen again.

Chatbots

CLI Help Bot

Chatbot that receives help question from users and refers to the right answer in addition to performing administrative tasks such as password resets for users.

Managed WordPress Bot

Chatbot that help a user create a WordPress site through chat. Credentials are emailed to the user upon site creation.

Help creating chatbots

Need help creating a chatbot? If the chatbot you want to create is not listed, we can make one of those too. Drop me a line. Let's make it happen.
